resources.string: Who owns your body? You or the government?

I agree that marijuana is not the most important issue. It is so unimportant I think we should stop wasting money locking people in prison over it and we should stop using it as an excuse to eviscerate the bill of rights.
You own your mind. You own your body.
Good ideas do not require force.
Corporations control the government. Therefore, we need more government.
People are greedy. Therefore, we need a government that is made up of people.
Free trade with all. Entangling alliances with no one.
War is the health of the state.
The war on terrorism is a contradiction. War is terrorism.
